mapper.select: with date_t as ( select to_date(#{startDate}) + level - 1 as dt from dual connect by level <= to_date(#{endDate}) - to_date(#{startDate}) ) , cur_data as ( select dt, sum(purchase) as machul, sum(order2) + sum(staff) + sum(cost) + sum(garb) as biyong from ( SELECT trunc(purchase_orderdate, 'dd') dt, SUM(PURCHASE_PRICE) as purchase, 0 as order2, 0 as staff, 0 as cost, 0 as garb FROM PURCHASE where purchase_orderdate between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by trunc(purchase_orderdate, 'dd') union all SELECT trunc(order_orderdate, 'dd'), 0, sum(total_price), 0, 0, 0 FROM ORDER2 where order_orderdate between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by trunc(order_orderdate, 'dd') union all SELECT trunc(cost_date, 'dd'), 0, 0, SUM(STAFF_COST), 0, 0 FROM STAFFMONEY where cost_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by trunc(cost_date, 'dd') union all SELECT trunc(cost_date, 'dd'), 0, 0, 0, SUM(ECT_COST), 0 FROM COST where cost_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by trunc(cost_date, 'dd') union all SELECT trunc(garbage_enddate, 'dd'), 0, 0, 0, 0, SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) FROM GARBAGE where garbage_enddate between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by trunc(garbage_enddate, 'dd') ) group by dt ) select to_char(a.dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "dt", nvl(b.machul, 0) as "sales", nvl(b.biyong, 0) as "cost", nvl(b.machul - b.biyong, 0) as "profit" from date_t a left join cur_data b on a.dt = b.dt order by a.dt
